name: Tank Fury Beta
description:
TANK FURY!

You're in control of a Mighty Tank! Bust through Enemy Obstacles like Tanks and Bunkers! Blast tanks with the tanks fury! Avoid getting shot up too much! Follow the road to find exits!

COMING SOON!

Points system, HUD display, graphical icons, more tanks, boss tanks(battles), fuel gauge, fuel tanks, and much, much more!

INSTRUCTIONS:

Move with Arrow Keys or WSAD.

Aim with Mouse, shoot with Left Mouse Button.

Enjoy!
